blogs.title: From Coffee Grounds to Comfy Soles: The Science Behind Sunnystep’s Sustainable Shoes
blogs.body:
At Sunnystep, we’re passionate about reducing waste, so we’ve partnered with the world's best material scientists to transform used coffee grounds into the fabric for the uppers of our Dream Sneakers, Dream Oxford, and Dream Mules. It’s all about blending science, sustainability, and a little coffee magic to create a new kind of comfort.

We love coffee. But the waste it creates? Not so much.

In 2020 alone, the world consumed nearly 10 million tons of coffee, resulting in over 6 million tons of used coffee grounds. That’s about 20 grams of waste per cup of coffee—or enough grounds to fill 2,500 Olympic-sized swimming pools every year!

Most of this waste heads straight to landfills, where they create significant environmental issues:

blogs.title: The Science of Comfort: Sunnystep x MIT Sports Lab Collaboration
blogs.body:
Nov 20,2024

At Sunnystep, we believe that comfort is an art and a science. To push the boundaries of what a shoe can do, we knew we needed to think beyond traditional design. That’s why we teamed up with one of the brightest minds in research and innovation—the MIT Sports Lab. Together, we’re not just making shoes; we’re redefining the very science of movement, and we’re thrilled to bring you along on the journey.

blogs.title: Should You Go Barefoot at Home?
blogs.body:
Jun 12,2023 | Marketing Sunnystep

I’m sure some of us have experienced our mothers, aunties or uncles sternly reminding us to remove our shoes before entering the house. In Asian societies like Singapore, taking off your shoes before entering a home is common practice, but many do not know whether going barefoot is good or bad for your feet.

blogs.title: Memory Foam Shoes - Are They Really the Best for Your Feet?
blogs.body:
Jun 12,2023 | Marketing Sunnystep

Soft, comfortable and energy absorbent, these are the features that describe the material we know as memory foam. Although it sounds perfect for happy feet, research surrounding this high-tech material says otherwise, making us question whether it is suitable for your feet.

blogs.title: Women Deserve Way Better Information About Pregnancy Spine Health
blogs.body:
Feb 17,2021 | Miss Balance

When I was pregnant, I read everything I could find about pregnancy and babies. Whenever I was free, I would be surfing online in different forums and platforms reading about the experiences of other mothers and numerous expert advice and opinions.

blogs.title: How my yoga instructor caused an injury that I had to get surgery for
blogs.body:
Feb 12,2021 | Miss Balance

If you’ve read the Founder’s Story, you may think that Ting’s story sounds like a one-off freak accident that only happens to the unluckiest of the unluckiest.

blogs.title: Why you shouldn’t rush back into exercise after giving birth
blogs.body:
Feb 12,2021 | Miss Balance

There are so many things people don’t know about prenatal and postnatal fitness. Some people, women included, aren’t even aware that this fitness specialty exists.

blogs.title: One Step At A Time
blogs.body:
Feb 17,2021 | Miss Balance

Rise and shine. My alarm hasn’t gone off, but I know it’s five in the morning. I know because I’ve gotten up at the same time for the same run for more than twenty years now.

faqs.question: What is Sunnystep?
faqs.answer: Sunnystep is a Singapore-based footwear brand that combines science, sustainability, and style to support movement. Our shoes are designed to minimize stress on the feet and body, empowering you to move freely and happily.

faqs.question: What makes Sunnystep shoes different?
faqs.answer: Sunnystep shoes are engineered for all-day comfort, featuring structured arch support, a proprietary massage footbed, and shock-absorbing insoles. They are designed to be lightweight, durable, and versatile for everyday wear.

faqs.question: Does Sunnystep have physical stores?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have several stores across Singapore where you can try on our shoes. Visit our store locator for locations and opening hours.

faqs.question: How do I choose the right size?
faqs.answer: We recommend checking our size guide for the best fit, as sizing may vary between styles. Most notably, we suggest sizing up by two sizes for the Balance Space Runner.

faqs.question: Are Sunnystep shoes suitable for wide feet and bunions?
faqs.answer: Yes! All Sunnystep shoes have a wide toe box to provide extra space and prevent pressure on the toes. They are also made with skin-friendly, flexible materials that reduce friction and adapt to foot shape, offering greater comfort for those with wider feet or bunions.

faqs.question: How do I clean my Sunnystep shoes?
faqs.answer: Use a damp cloth or soft brush with mild soap to spot-clean. Avoid soaking the shoes in water. Let them air dry naturally—do not use a dryer or direct heat source.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide! Wherever you are, you can enjoy Sunnystep’s comfort and support.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Singapore: 2-4 business days. International: 7-14 business days, depending on location. Shipping times may vary during peak seasons.

faqs.question: How much does shipping cost?
faqs.answer: For Singapore: Enjoy free standard shipping on orders over SGD 120. A SGD 6 shipping fee applies to orders below SGD 120. For international orders: Shipping fees vary by country and will be displayed at checkout.

faqs.question: What is Sunnystep's exchange policy?
faqs.answer: We offer free exchanges within 14 days of purchase. Please ensure the shoes are in new and unworn condition.

faqs.question: How do I request and exchange or refund?
faqs.answer: Simply reach out to Customer Service via WhatsApp (+65 9372 9406) or email (care@mysunnystep.com), and we'll assist you with the exchange process.

faqs.question: Does Sunnystep offer repairs for defective shoes?
faqs.answer: Yes, if your shoes have a manufacturing defect within 6 months of purchase, Sunnystep will cover the repair costs. Customers must drop off their shoes at our Suntec City outlet or headquarters (City Hall) for assessment. After 6 months, repair and delivery fees will apply. The cost will be advised after assessment.
